title: [azure-pipelines-native] Add CI triggers for primary branches
body:
Restores the CI triggers to allow SkiaSharp-Native to run against main
and release branches.

comments.author: pjcollins
comments.body: I updated the trigger settings in the new pipeline to test that things are configured correctly and https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=11468584&view=results kicked off automatically so I think the new pipeline should be good to go. I'll revert those changes now and remove the dev branch from the list of branches to build.
